name: Black Widow
description: A former top KGB agent, Natasha Romanoff has become a force for good in the world of covert intelligence as an agent for S.H.I.E.L.D. Romanoff is an expert in multiple martial arts and a skilled gymnast, possessing superhuman strength, speed, agility, and endurance thanks to a version of the super-soldier serum she was given during her time in the KGB. As the Black Widow, Romanoff has also been a frequent member of the Avengers, where she puts her espionage and black ops expertise to work saving the world again and again.
